events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but would like to request a refund because the size was incorrect and it doesn't fit me at all.
System has identified the customer's inquiry as a refund request related to incorrect sizing.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund case for the incorrect jacket size.
Hello! This is Sarah from customer support. I understand you'd like to request a refund for your jacket. I'm here to help with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or damaged in any way?
Sure! My order number is 45789234. The jacket is brand new; I tried it on only once and there are no damages or marks on it.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process immediately and email you the return shipping label to send the jacket back at no cost.
Great, thank you for the quick response and helpful instructions. I appreciate the free return shipping.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund successfully and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the refund today. Everything looks good. Thank you for the excellent support!
Closing this case as the refund has been successfully completed and the customer has confirmed satisfaction.
